mapper.select: SELECT media_order as mediaOrder ,email as email ,media_title as mediaTitle ,media_submit_status as mediaSubmitStatus ,submit_dt as submitDt FROM adin_media_register WHERE 1=1 AND media_submit_status = "I" ORDER BY submit_dt LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM adin_media_register WHERE 1=1 AND media_submit_status = "I"

SELECT media_order as mediaOrder ,email as email ,ad_detail_category as adDetailCategory ,media_title as mediaTitle ,media_summary as mediaSummary ,media_detail_explain as mediaDetailExpalin ,thumbnail_img_nm as thumbnailImgNm ,thumbnail_origin_file_nm as thumbnailOriginFileNm ,thumbnail_img_file_path as thumbnailImgFilePath ,media_price as mediaPrice ,media_submit_status as mediaSubmitStatus ,create_dt as createDt ,modify_dt as modifyDt ,submit_dt as submitDt FROM adin_media_register WHERE 1=1 AND media_order = #{mediaOrder}
